lang::Ptr< T > Class Template Reference
[Language support library]

#include <Ptr.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class lang::Ptr< T >

Smart pointer to an object of class T.

T must implement addReference() and release().

See also:
Object

 Return reference to the object.

 Returns pointer to the object.

 Access member of the object.

 Releases old reference if any, increments other object reference count and stores the new reference.

 Returns pointer to the object.
